metadata.Title: CVE-2023-34057 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: VMware Tools contains a local privilege escalation vulnerability. A malicious actor with local user access to a guest virtual machine may elevate privileges within the virtual machine.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> This is a macOS specific issue, Ubuntu is not affected

criterions.comment: open-vm-tools: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
